Articles.Content:
So, I somehow managed to put 5 Mainsails in the same fuel tank:

I liked my invention so much that I started playing around with it, and ended up with this:

But then, while messing around with the thing, I broke the game:

I had put 2 mainsails... In the same place. YES, ONE INSIDE OF THE OTHER ONE

And yes, it DID flew:

So, I knew what I had to do:

All these babies reach Mach 1 in something like 3-3.5 seconds

Here are the craft files for the "5 Mainsails-4 LVT" and the "6 Mainsails"
